Description: The cmdlet 'Restart-AzHDInsightHost' no longer has output type 'Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.Models.Cluster'.
The property 'NetworkSettings' of type 'Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.Models.ClusterGetProperties' has been removed.
Remediation: Add the property 'NetworkSettings' back to type 'Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.Models.ClusterGetProperties'.
